name: Iron & Blood: Warriors of Ravenloft
description:
To Poke? 

Or To BludGeon & DisemBowel.


Some farmer with a stick giving you a once over?

Or an armored killing machine splitting your skull open with a rusty mace.

225,000 polygons per second action
18 gothic arenas
16 deadly characters
Over 64 weapons and 250 brutal medieval combat moves
Head-to-head tournament and team campaign modes
Blood & gore galore
